column1: Nursing with Registration as an Adult Nurse MSc
column3: Florence Nightingale Faculty of Nursing, Midwifery & Palliative Care
column5: Nursing is about more than caring for patients. Nursing is grasping the importance of policy, exploring clinical leadership and understanding how research influences decision making. By the time you graduate from King’s College London, you’ll have the skills and confidence to kick-start your career as an adult nurse and deliver, develop, lead and research healthcare
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
